Detailed Description

Author:
Bjoern Knafla <bknafla@uni-kassel.de>

Jens Breitbart modified the smart pointer to support device pointers

Version:
0.1
Date:
24.07.06
Reference counting smart pointer for device pointer.

Function Documentation

void cupp::thread_synchronize (  ) 

Synchronizes the calling thread with the asynchronius CUDA calls. You should never need to call this manually
